lead_paragraph: GLOBMAN--Arthur, passed away on June 29, 2014 at age 92. Beloved husband of the late Shirley. Devoted father of Esther (and Richie) Altman and Lisa Baumstein. Adored grandfather of Katie and David Baumstein. His independent spirit and caring nature were an inspiration to all who knew him. Service today, July 1, 2014, 9:30am at Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, Amsterdam Ave and 91st St.
